plugins.name: Autolink
plugins.description: Automatically turns plain text links in the document into active URLs as you write. Works for emails, too.

plugins.name: AlightEmailLink
plugins.description: Brings support for inserting hyperlinks into the content and offers the UI to create and edit them.

htmlOutput._comment: If `config.link.addTargetToEmailLinks` is enabled, then the external links are decorated with `rel` and `target` attributes.
The plugin can be configured to set any classes, styles or attributes on the `<a>` tag via custom `config.link.decorators` configuration.

plugins.name: AlightEmailLink image
plugins.description: Allows adding clickable links to images for creating banners or referrers.
